trans-unit.source: Provides data for events that need a <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> answer to a question.

This class is currently used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDirtyStateNeeded> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
It allows you to specify a response to events that occur when the control needs the answer to a question.
The answer to the question is specified by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A> property.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs"></xref> class using a default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response*> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified default value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response*> property.
The default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response*> property.
Gets or sets a value indicating the response to a question represented by the event.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for an affirmative response; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
